About me

I am a Front-End Developer with a background in Electronics Engineering. I have realized that coding is my true passion, and this is the area I really want to focus on and dedicate my life to.
That's why I decided to change my specialty to a Front-End Development and started to study all the necessary knowledge for this profession.
I chose this particular area because it perfectly combines visual and programming components, which I find incredible.
I am always focused on improving my skills as Front-End Developer. Looking forward to implement excellent projects with wonderful people.
